title: The potential utility of dendritic fibrous nanosilica as an adsorbent and a catalyst in carbon capture, utilization, and storage
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,9976-10011
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00564C, Review Article
Sam Yeol Lim, Sherif A. Younis, Ki-Hyun Kim, Jechan Lee
Dendritic fibrous nanosilica (DFNS) is one of the most promising materials for carbon capture, utilization, and storage (CCUS) applications with tunable activity and selectivity.
